name: useDarkMode
description: Custom hook that returns the current state of the dark mode.

props.name: options
props.description: The initial value of the dark mode, default `false`.

schema.name: defaultValue
schema.description: The initial value of the dark mode.

schema.name: initializeWithValue
schema.description: If `true` (default), the hook will initialize reading `localStorage`. In SSR, you should set it to `false`, returning the `defaultValue` or `false` initially.

schema.name: localStorageKey
schema.description: The key to use in the local storage.

returns.name: disable
returns.description: Function to disable the dark mode.

returns.name: enable
returns.description: Function to enable the dark mode.

returns.name: isDarkMode
returns.description: The current state of the dark mode.

returns.name: set
returns.description: Function to set a specific value to the dark mode.

returns.name: toggle
returns.description: Function to toggle the dark mode.
